title: the training stops without errors
body:
Hello,

I am using Microsoft Windows 10 Pro, anaconda 3, with CPU Processor Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz, 3192 Mhz, 6 Core(s) & DeepLabCut 2.1.5.

The problem with dlc occurs when I am training the data. At first I get the message "Starting training...." and the CPU is working well. after a while I see that the iterations are working, but then suddenly the CPU stops. after a long while it continues and so are the iterations, but then stops again, and the whole process ends completely without any error message. 

One thing that I have noticed is that when the iterations and CPU are working well, the memory is using 75% - 77%  (and keeps on going). The memory of the computer is 32 GB, maybe the problem is here...? I'm not sure. 

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
```
In [1]: import deeplabcut

In [2]: config_path = r"C:\Users\User\demo-ornaim-2020-01-23\config.yaml"

In [5]: deeplabcut.train_network(config_path)
Config:
{'all_joints': [[0], [1]],
 'all_joints_names': ['hand', 'nose'],
 'batch_size': 1,
 'bottomheight': 400,
 'crop': True,
 'crop_pad': 0,
 'cropratio': 0.4,
 'dataset': 'training-datasets\\iteration-0\\UnaugmentedDataSet_demoJan23\\demo_ornaim95shuffle1.mat',
 'dataset_type': 'default',
 'deterministic': False,
 'display_iters': 1000,
 'fg_fraction': 0.25,
 'global_scale': 0.8,
 'init_weights': 'C:\\Users\\User\\Anaconda3\\envs\\dlc-windowsCPU\\lib\\site-packages\\deeplabcut\\pose_estimation_tensorflow\\models\\pretrained\\resnet_v1_50.ckpt',
 'intermediate_supervision': False,
 'intermediate_supervision_layer': 12,
 'leftwidth': 400,
 'location_refinement': True,
 'locref_huber_loss': True,
 'locref_loss_weight': 0.05,
 'locref_stdev': 7.2801,
 'log_dir': 'log',
 'max_input_size': 1500,
 'mean_pixel': [123.68, 116.779, 103.939],
 'metadataset': 'training-datasets\\iteration-0\\UnaugmentedDataSet_demoJan23\\Documentation_data-demo_95shuffle1.pickle',
 'min_input_size': 64,
 'minsize': 100,
 'mirror': False,
 'multi_step': [[0.005, 10000],
                [0.02, 430000],
                [0.002, 730000],
                [0.001, 1030000]],
 'net_type': 'resnet_50',
 'num_joints': 2,
 'optimizer': 'sgd',
 'pos_dist_thresh': 17,

 'regularize': False,
 'rightwidth': 400,
 'save_iters': 50000,
 'scale_jitter_lo': 0.5,
 'scale_jitter_up': 1.25,
 'scoremap_dir': 'test',
 'shuffle': True,
 'snapshot_prefix': 'C:\\Users\\User\\demo-ornaim-2020-01-23\\dlc-models\\iteration-0\\demoJan23-trainset95shuffle1\\train\\snapshot',
 'stride': 8.0,
 'topheight': 400,

 'weigh_only_present_joints': False,
 'weigh_part_predictions': False,

Training parameter:
```
